ygData.subject: Re: Minotaur Horn
ygData.msgSnippet: I was in the chat area and a guide, I believe, who also seemed to know a lot about bards, said that the magical effects of the minotaur horn are a future
ygData.messageBody:
I was in the chat area and a guide, I believe, who also seemed to know a lot
about bards, said that the magical effects of the minotaur horn are a
"future" thing, so hold on to those horns!
-----Original Message-----
From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 4:39 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Minotaur Horn


>From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
>
>>I now have a Minotaur horn which one of my friends gave me. Does anyone
>>know what this is for? It says it is a bard-only item, no stats except
0.1
>>weight. I am not sure if it acts like an instrument or not, as I dont
have
>>a song yet to possibly use this with.
>
>It's a wind instrument. You'll need it (or a Flute) for the Invisibility
song.
>
> - Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
>
>
>
